name: One With Nature (chowMaterials)
description:
The Game is a submission for the GMTK Game jam 2021.

The game is about a Nymph which is trying to protect the forest she is bound to from humans who want to harvest the wood.  The Nymph can send bears to attack the people. The Nymph is at a disadvantage tho as she cannot fly away from the forest as she is linked to it and severing this connection can mean death.

Coded by Chow Materials and Àre Maturana

Art by pixelartchemist

Music by Stifo
